title: Bluetooth Basics
content: - Bluetooth is a short-range wireless communication technology.
- It uses radio waves to connect devices within a small radius, typically around 30 feet.
- Bluetooth is used for a wide range of applications, including:
- Connecting headphones and speakers to phones
image_desc: - A diagram showing a smartphone, wireless headphones, and a smartwatch connected via Bluetooth.
narration: Bluetooth is a short-range wireless technology that uses radio waves to connect devices. Imagine it as a tiny radio transmitter and receiver in each device, allowing them to communicate without wires. You use Bluetooth every day to connect your headphones to your phone, pair your smartwatch, or even control your smart home devices.
